dct_description_sm: At page top, above map: TERRES ARCTIQUES. [PAGE] 273[,] FIGURE XCIX. [Figure]273 (map top right). Tome I. (page bottom left) and S (page bottom right). Issued in his: Description de l'univers, Tome I, Paris, 1683.
Issued in his German edition: Beschreibung des ganzen Welt-Kreisses ..., V, Franckfurt, 1684.

At page top, above map: Das unter den Nord=Pol gelogene Veste Land. Fig. 99. With French title inside border and German title outside border. Issued in his: Description de L’Univers … Chez Jean David Zunner .. Francfurt, 1685. Issued in his German edition: Beschreibung des gantzen weltkreises …, J.A. Jung … Frankfurt am Mayn, 1719.
LC 3447, 4280; BN Manesson-Mallet I A(100) & I B; Faupel's Americana 91/71

Northern hemisphere. Northern part of California shown with nearly flat northern coast. Northwestern coastline of North America starts to extend west near 60 deg. N. Text on verso entitled "Terre de Jesso."
